courses.title: ISS 240: Web-Based Multimedia Communications
courses.description: Introduction to HTML/CSS and JS for web development.

courses.title: ISS 241: Web Project Design and Development
courses.description: Continuing web development with JavaScript, Node.js, and full-stack development.

courses.title: VMS 328 / ISS 214 / Lit 317: Media Theory
courses.description: Introduction to the core concepts of media theory with special attention to artists writing on media, medium, and mediation.

courses.title: VMS 202D: Introduction to Visual Culture
courses.description: Introduction to the core concepts of visual culture with a special emphasis on new media and current events.
